Detailed Description

A class for loading, parsing and assigning skins.

wxSkinEngine loads and parses skin files in the wxSkin XML format. It also maintains assocciations between identifiers and windows and can assign (new) skins to existing window controls derived from wxSkinWindow. wxSkinEngine is a signleton and you should not store pointers to it.

Member Function Documentation

bool wxSkinEngine::AssignControl ( const wxString &  label,
const wxWindow *  ptr 
)

Map an instance of a wxWindow or wxSkinWindow to a label. If the label occurs in a loaded wxSkin file, the skin and properties will be assigned to the control when calling InitializeSkin().

void wxSkinEngine::ClearAssignments (  ) 

Clears the map of assigned controls. Call this if you need to create a new label <-> control mapping.

void wxSkinEngine::ClearSkin (  ) 

Clears the currently loaded skin. This does not reset the GUI, it only clears internal assignments. The map of assigned controls is not altered.

static void wxSkinEngine::Destroy (  )  [static]

Destroys the currently active instance.

static wxSkinEngine* wxSkinEngine::Get (  )  [static]

As wxSkinEngine is a singleton, use Get() to access the running instance.

wxString wxSkinEngine::GetCustomSkinInfo (  )  [inline]

Returns the custom info property.

void wxSkinEngine::GetDefaultSkin ( wxSkinWindow *  win  ) 

Used internaly. Gets the "default" skin for the specified window.

wxString wxSkinEngine::GetSkinApplication (  )  [inline]

Returns the skin application property.

wxString wxSkinEngine::GetSkinAuthor (  )  [inline]

Returns the skin author property.

wxString wxSkinEngine::GetSkinComment (  )  [inline]

Returns the skin comment property.

wxString wxSkinEngine::GetSkinName (  )  [inline]

Returns the skin name property.

wxImage wxSkinEngine::GetSkinScreenshot (  )  [inline]

Loads and returns a screenshot image for the skin if one was given. Note that screenshots will be resized if they are bigger than 300*300 px.

wxColour wxSkinEngine::GetTransparencyColour (  )  [inline]

Gets the tranparency colour set through the skin file. Standard colour is R=255, G=0, B=255.

void wxSkinEngine::InitializeSkin (  ) 

Calling this initializes the loaded skin. This will assign the correct skin images and properties to all assigned/mapped windows.

bool wxSkinEngine::Load ( const wxString &  file  ) 

Load a wxSkin file from the given location. Files can either be zipped or plain XML files. Load() will determine the format automatically.

Parameters:
file the location of the file to load
Returns:
true on success, false if loading or parsing failed.

bool wxSkinEngine::LoadInfo ( const wxString &  file,
wxString &  name,
wxString &  author,
wxString &  comment,
wxString &  application,
wxString &  custInfo,
wxImage &  screenshot 
)

Basically the same as Load(), but it only loads the "info" fields for skin files from the "skin" XML tag and returns the info.

Parameters:
file the location of the file to load
name the name of the skin
author the skins author
comment the skins comment
application the skins application property
custInfo the skins custom info
screenshot the skins screenshot
Returns:
true on success, false if loading or parsing failed.
